title: Graph shows impact of central bank bond purchase

content.question: Assume a country’s banking system has limited reserves. Which event would have caused the shift of the money supply curve from S1 to S2 in the money market shown above?

choices.label: The purchase of government bonds on the open market by the central bank
An increase in the required reserve ratio
A short-run increase in output, employment, and income
An increase in general price level in the country
An increase in the supply of the country’s currency in foreign exchange markets

content.answer: The purchase of government bonds on the open market by the central bank

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
